author: 0x0oz
content:
Hey, I know it might not be the right place to ask questions but I don’t know where else to ask that question

Why is it needed to have the whole block chain history stored somewhere now or in the future

I know it’s important that the users be able to verify everything because it is *trustless* , but again we always need to trust the majority of the network to be honest … can’t we just trust that they *were* honest and use their snapshots?
